meanings.sent1: The mountain stream was unpolluted by any harmful substances.
meanings.sent2: The unpolluted air in the countryside was refreshing to breathe.
meanings.sent3: She felt like an unpolluted princess in her sparkling clean gown.
meanings.sent4: His mind was like an unpolluted lake, clear and undisturbed.
meanings.sent5: The unpolluted sky at night was filled with twinkling stars.

meanings.sent1: The unpolluted water from the natural spring tasted so pure.
meanings.sent2: The unpolluted soil in the organic garden yielded healthy crops.
meanings.sent3: The unpolluted glass of water seemed to sparkle in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like an unpolluted melody in the noisy room.
meanings.sent5: The unpolluted diamond shone brilliantly in the light.

meanings.sent1: The unpolluted kitchen gleamed after a thorough cleaning.
meanings.sent2: The unpolluted conscience of the child was evident in his honesty.
meanings.sent3: The unpolluted snow blanketed the ground in a pristine white.
meanings.sent4: Her unpolluted intentions were clear from her actions.
meanings.sent5: The unpolluted joy on their faces was contagious.
